title: Keepin' silent
creator_credit: National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
brief_description: This compilation of footage from Australia’s silent era (1896-1930) encompasses examples of actuality, documentary, newsreels, home movies, advertisements, animation, narrative shorts and features. With piano accompaniment by Mrs Betty Magner.
